location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: manuscript; ink on tracing paperDimensions: 435 x 340mm, on sheet 462 x 352mm.

mods.abstract: A sketch map of the proposed landing ground at Bait Al-Falaj. The map is part of a letter sent from Charles Stuart Burnett, Air Commodore, Air Officer Commanding, Iraq Command. The map shows that a portion of the landing ground requires levelling in place and that the water runways (Falaj holes) require concreting over, and the surface water diverted, besides other work to be done.
